var todoList=function todoList(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_ITEM':var data=action.payload;return[{id:data.id,text:data.text}].concat(_toConsumableArray(state));case'DEL_ITEM':{return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.id;});}default:return state;}};export default todoList;
